name: Senior AI Engineer
content:
About the job
Hiring AI Engineer 👋
Location: Kathmandu, Sankhamul (Onsite)
Employment Type: Full-time
company: Vrit Technologies 



About the Role :
We're seeking a versatile AI Engineer to build AI-powered solutions that transform our business. Your initial focus: developing an intelligent customer support chatbot for social media that handles orders, product inquiries, and customer service. You'll later expand into recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and other AI applications.


What You'll Do: 



Current Priority: Customer Support Chatbot
- Build conversational AI for social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Twitter)
- Develop NLU capabilities for intent recognition and entity extraction
- Implement order processing and product inquiry workflows
- Integrate with CRM and order management systems


Future AI Initiatives :
- Design recommendation engines and predictive analytics models
- Build computer vision solutions and automated content generation tools
- Develop fraud detection and business intelligence systems


Requirements :
Must Have:
- 3+ years in AI/ML engineering
- 2+ years building conversational AI/chatbots
- Strong Python skills
- Experience with TensorFlow/PyTorch, Hugging Face, LangChain
- Hands-on with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude, Llama)
- API development and cloud deployment (AWS/GCP/Azure)
- SQL and NoSQL databases


Nice to Have:
- Master's/PhD in CS, AI, or ML (optional)
- Computer vision experience
- MLOps tools (MLflow, Kubeflow)
- Multi-lingual chatbot development
- E-commerce or customer service domain knowledge


What We Offer :
- Work on cutting-edge AI technology
- Professional development budget
- Flexible work arrangements
- Competitive salary and benefits
- Collaborative, innovative environment


How to Apply :
Email your resume, portfolio/GitHub, and cover letter to:
bibek@vrittechnologies.com (CC: taruka@vrittechnologies.com)


Subject: "Application: AI Engineer Position"
Thank you.
